scripts.docs: typedoc --out docs/ts . && mkdirp build && concat -o build/merged-schema.graphql resources/graphql/channel-segment/schema.graphql resources/graphql/common/schema.graphql resources/graphql/data-acquisition/schema.graphql resources/graphql/event/schema.graphql resources/graphql/qc-mask/schema.graphql resources/graphql/signal-detection/schema.graphql resources/graphql/station/schema.graphql resources/graphql/waveform/schema.graphql resources/graphql/waveform-filter-definition/schema.graphql resources/graphql/workflow/schema.graphql && graphdoc --force --output docs/graphql --schema build/merged-schema.graphql
scripts.dev: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development node --max-old-space-size=8142 --inspect-brk --harmony --nolazy ./build/server.js
scripts.dev-osd: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=development NODE_CONFIG_ENV=osd_local_sandbox node --max-old-space-size=8142 --inspect-brk --harmony --nolazy ./build/server.js
scripts.start: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production node --max-old-space-size=8142 ./build/server.js
scripts.start-osd: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_CONFIG_ENV=osd_local_sandbox node --max-old-space-size=8142 ./build/server.js
scripts.start-osd-release: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_CONFIG_ENV=osd_local_release node --max-old-space-size=8142 ./build/server.js
scripts.start-osd-live: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_CONFIG_ENV=osd_local_sandbox NODE_CONFIG='{"defaultNetwork":"acquired"}' node --max-old-space-size=8142 ./build/server.js
scripts.start-osd-live-release: npm run build && cross-env NODE_ENV=production NODE_CONFIG_ENV=osd_local_release NODE_CONFIG='{"defaultNetwork":"acquired"}' node --max-old-space-size=8142 ./build/server.js
